subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mike Maccagnan said he intended to speak with the five teams ahead of the Jets in the N.F.L. draft order to gauge the cost of moving up, but added that he preferred having more picks.
snippet: Mike Maccagnan said he intended to speak with the five teams ahead of the Jets in the N.F.L. draft order to gauge the cost of moving up, but added that he preferred having more picks.
